function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of COVID-19 due to group analysis and data collection","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission if COVID-19 protocols are not followed","Mitigation":"Institute strict COVID-19 safety protocols for data collection and analysis","Technologies":"Contactless data collection technologies, virtual collaboration tools","People":"Researchers, data analysts, respondents","Owner":"Research institutions, data analysts"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of COVID-19 influence on WTP for green roofs","Impact":"Inaccurate results and conclusions if COVID-19 impact is not adequately assessed","Mitigation":"Incorporate COVID-19 context into the analysis of WTP for green roofs","Technologies":"Statistical models incorporating COVID-19 variables","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, data analysts"},{"Description":"Limited understanding of variable interaction in COVID-19 context","Impact":"Risk of drawing incomplete or inaccurate conclusions about variable interaction under COVID-19 conditions","Mitigation":"Conduct both uncontrolled and controlled analysis to assess variable interaction in COVID-19 context","Technologies":"Statistical modeling software, data analysis tools","People":"Research analysts, statisticians","Owner":"Research institutions, data analysts"}]}
